definition: of or relating to pharmacy or pharmacists, drug or medicine that is prepared or dispensed in pharmacies and used in medical treatment
details:
adjective
- of or relating to pharmacy or pharmacists
= example: of or relating to pharmacy or pharmacists
= synonyms: pharmaceutic
- of or relating to drugs used in medical treatment
noun
- drug or medicine that is prepared or dispensed in pharmacies and used in medical treatment
= synonyms: pharmaceutic
